January 19, 2014 at 12:59PM DIN Is Noise is a musical instrument for Windows, Mac OS X and GNU/Linux, Use your mouse & keyboard to make high quality music. Live. And improvise.

Inspired by central-asian bowed string instruments, The Morin Khuur, the Kobyz, the Erhu, the Kamancheh, the Sarangi, And oh the Cello.

An excellent Theremin when you arent playing right ;) Or play a raga of Indian classical music, With enough Meend and Gamaks, To bring your Guru to her knees!http://ift.tt/Ktd7FW
